Scissors.name: Scissors
Scissors.description: A basic pair of scissors. Snip snip.

Fountain Pen.name: Fountain Pen
Fountain Pen.description: A kind of pen for writing. The ink inside the pen holder flows out through the nib, allowing it to be used for a long time - though your hand will be covered in ink if not used correctly. Or if you are a lefty.

Kitchen Knife.name: Kitchen Knife
Kitchen Knife.description: A knife used in the kitchen. It can be a deadly weapon in the hands of an expert.

Army Knife.name: Army Knife
Army Knife.description: Very threatening yet easy to carry. It faithfully performs its duties, such as cutting and stabbing.

Vibroblade.name: Vibroblade
Vibroblade.description: This high-frequency vibrating blade will cleave the matter of its target at a molecular level. The knife vibrates at a frequency beyond human imagination.

Rusty Sword.name: Rusty Sword
Rusty Sword.description: Every swordsman must train with this common longsword.

Shamshir.name: Shamshir
Shamshir.description: The name translates into "The Tail of the Lion." A symbolic sword of Persia, it's also known to be the origin of the sabre.

Katana.name: Katana
Katana.description: I can't believe that I'm actually holding a Japanese sword that I saw in the movies!

Masamune.name: Masamune
Masamune.description: A sword made by Masamune, the greatest sword maker in the history of Japan. It stands as one of the strongest and sharpest swords of Japan.

Muramasa.name: Muramasa
Muramasa.description: A sword cursing the Tokugawa family, who were the founders of Japan's Tokugawa shogunate. Tokugawa Leyasu's grandfather, father, and son were all killed or wounded by this sword, and Leyasu himself also had his finger cut off.

Bastard Sword.name: Bastard Sword
Bastard Sword.description: In the Middle Ages, the Bastard Sword was the only weapon with the characteristics of both a double-handed sword and a single-handed sword, so it was named Bastard, meaning mixed breed.

Jewel Sword.name: Jewel Sword
Jewel Sword.description: Valuable by its very existence. Often is the case of such swords that were made with precious materials or used by a famous hero.

Arondight.name: Arondight
Arondight.description: The sword of Sir Lancelot, who was a dragon slayer that cut down the fire drake during the rescue of princess Elaine of Corbenic.

Excalibur.name: Excalibur
Excalibur.description: A noted sword produced in Avalon, the nation of fairies. King  Arthur received this sword from the beautiful Lady of the Lake and returned it after the final battle against Prince Mordred.

Plasma Sword.name: Plasma Sword
Plasma Sword.description: A sword made from the combination of ion nuclei and free electrons kept at an ultra-high temperature, also known as plasma. Due to its explosive nature, it's hard to handle, but it could be the start of an era of future weaponry. The plasma sword is the first of its kind.

Laevateinn.name: Laevateinn
Laevateinn.description: In Norse mythology, Laevateinn is a sword that was made by Loki by carving runes into it. In mythology, it is used to kill the invincible rooster, Vidofnir.

Monohoshizao.name: Monohoshizao
Monohoshizao.description: A sword with a long blade. Legend says Kojiro Sasaki cut a flying swallow with this sword. A technique known as "Upward Cutting" is commonly used after an opponent dodges the first attack.

Hovud.name: Hovud
Hovud.description: It is said that this blade, as mentioned briefly in "Prose Edda", was used by the Nordic mythical god Heimdallr and was made out of broken pieces of the rainbow bridge, Bifröst. The entire blade emits a dark blue aura, which makes the sword difficult to approach. Some people believe this blade's name means "head".

Twin Swords.name: Twin Swords
Twin Swords.description: Double the sword, double the offense!

Florentine.name: Florentine
Florentine.description: The master of these swords from Florence says you can't use them seperately. One in each hand at all times.

Divine Dual Swords.name: Divine Dual Swords
Divine Dual Swords.description: A swordsmanship technique created and refined by Miyamoto Musashi. It involves using two swords, a shortsword in one hand and a longsword in the other.

Starsteel Twin Swords.name: Starsteel Twin Swords
Starsteel Twin Swords.description: A pair of swords that Liu Bei used in "Romance of the Three Kingdoms".

Dioscuri.name: Dioscuri
Dioscuri.description: Named after the Greek mythological twin brothers, Castor and Pollux. Twins but with different dads!

Lloigor & Zahr.name: Lloigor & Zahr
Lloigor & Zahr.description: You'll love crafting these twin swords, just be careful if you feel wind but the weather isn't windy. Lloigor might be watching.

Hammer.name: Hammer
Hammer.description: Try not to hammer your finger instead of the nail...

Warhammer.name: Warhammer
Warhammer.description: It's like a gift set of close combat weapons! Includes a hammer for striking, a spear for piercing, and a sword for slashing.

Morning Star.name: Morning Star
Morning Star.description: A blunt weapon you use with both hands. It was used by infantry against knights on horseback. The head of the weapon can be changed according to the user's style.

Hammer of Thor.name: Hammer of Thor
Hammer of Thor.description: The hammer that Thor, the God of Thunder, used. Also called Mjolnir, meaning "The Destroyer."

Magic Stick.name: Magic Stick
Magic Stick.description: The stick often carried by the main characters of Shoujo comics. The moral of the Shoujo genre is that peace must be maintained through greater power.

Pickaxe.name: Pickaxe
Pickaxe.description: Can we consider it a blade attack if you swing the pickaxe and attack your opponent..?

Hatchet.name: Hatchet
Hatchet.description: It looks heavy, so attack with it by slicing downward.

Chain Scythe.name: Chain Scythe
Chain Scythe.description: A weapon of the Grim Reaper that has a sharp scythe at one end of a steel chain.

Battle Axe.name: Battle Axe
Battle Axe.description: Although it started as a tool for men, it proved itself useful in the battlefield. It's designed to rip flesh and cut bones, so it has a thinner and lighter blade than a usual ax.

Reaper's Scythe.name: Reaper's Scythe
Reaper's Scythe.description: A weapon that the Grim Reaper carries. If the scythe claims someone, that soul will vanish.

Beam Axe.name: Beam Axe
Beam Axe.description: Widely used since the Old Stone Age, it became a masterpiece when fused with modern technology.

Santa Muerte.name: Santa Muerte
Santa Muerte.description: Santa Muerte, the Mexican goddess of death, cuts off all negative energies with her long-handled scythe.

Harpe.name: Harpe
Harpe.description: The sword given to Perseus by Hermes, the God of Thieves. He used this to cut off Medusa's head and to rescue Andromeda from a sea monster.

Short Spear.name: Short Spear
Short Spear.description: A spear with a short shaft - about half the size of a long spear. Learn how to move freely during battle while wielding this weapon and attack with a fearless combat posture.

Bamboo Spear.name: Bamboo Spear
Bamboo Spear.description: A spear made out of bamboo. Yup.

Bident.name: Bident
Bident.description: The weapon of Hades, the Greek god of the underworld.  It's a two-pronged spear and one of the known treasures of Hades, along with his cornucopia and helmet.

Halberd Axe.name: Halberd Axe
Halberd Axe.description: On one end there's an ax blade and on the other end there's a stabbing blade.

Cosmic Bident.name: Cosmic Bident
Cosmic Bident.description: A futuristic version of the spear of Hades, the Greek god of the underworld.  Snuff out the future of your enemy with this futuristic technology.

Lance of Poseidon.name: Lance of Poseidon
Lance of Poseidon.description: A powerful spear that can bring forth waves. It's said to have once been used by Poseidon.

Blazing Lance.name: Blazing Lance
Blazing Lance.description: The length stretches freely, and flames spurt from the end of the spear; a treasure that appeared in "Fengshen Yanyi."

Dragon Guandao.name: Dragon Guandao
Dragon Guandao.description: Made of 49 kg of iron during the Three Kingdoms period. It was thought to be used by Guan Yu.

Spear of Longinus.name: Spear of Longinus
Spear of Longinus.description: Though its origins may be unclear, this spear is said to have been involved in mythical holiness. Texts say that this spear has the ability to heal its owner under certain conditions.

Branch.name: Branch
Branch.description: Now's not the time to protect the environment. Now is the time to protect yourself.

Short Rod.name: Short Rod
Short Rod.description: Fine to carry and suitable for offense.

Long Rod.name: Long Rod
Long Rod.description: You can keep more distance than when using a short rod, but you still have to be careful.

Goblin Bat.name: Goblin Bat
Goblin Bat.description: A supernatural demon from the East that is said to be playful with humans. Westerns may identify them as an "Imp."

Umbrella.name: Umbrella
Umbrella.description: You might wonder how this became a weapon, but it is often used as a murder weapon in mystery stories.

Torch.name: Torch
Torch.description: The torch that lights your way might help you keep your own life from being extinguished. If you see an enemy, don't hesitate to swing.

Statue of Soteria.name: Statue of Soteria
Statue of Soteria.description: Give me your tired, your poor, your huddled masses yearning to breathe free, the wretched refuse of your teeming shore. Send these, the homeless, tempest-tossed to me. I lift my lamp beside the golden door.

Spy Umbrella.name: Spy Umbrella
Spy Umbrella.description: There is a poisoned needle concealed at the tip of the umbrella. You can make use of it when the timing is right. Pretend to accidentally stab your target's foot with the tip while carrying it on a rainy day.

Monkey King Bar.name: Monkey King Bar
Monkey King Bar.description: A tool, made by Daode Tianzun, used for measuring the depth of the river and sea. The Dragon King of the East Sea kept it in his palace storage, but Sun Wukong stole it and used it as a weapon.

Brass Knuckles.name: Brass Knuckles
Brass Knuckles.description: These are actually illegal in a lot of countries.

Iron Knuckles.name: Iron Knuckles
Iron Knuckles.description: Though it may look like ordinary knuckles, but it's made with a much sturdier iron, so it hits much harder.

Gauntlet.name: Gauntlet
Gauntlet.description: Gloves that knights wore to protect their hands.

Wing Knuckles.name: Wing Knuckles
Wing Knuckles.description: Free your burdened soul with these masterfully created wings. But there exists no sky for you to spread your wings...

Bone Gauntlet.name: Bone Gauntlet
Bone Gauntlet.description: Armored gloves made from a turtle shell.

Shatter Shell Gauntlet.name: Shatter Shell Gauntlet
Shatter Shell Gauntlet.description: A glove that adds explosive force behind each punch.

Glass Knuckles.name: Glass Knuckles
Glass Knuckles.description: Knuckles coated with glass fragments. They're not entirely made of glass!

Phoenix Gloves.name: Phoenix Gloves
Phoenix Gloves.description: You cannot reach the point of Nirvana to separate your body and soul, but you can remove others' souls from their bodies with this glove.

Bloodwing Knuckles.name: Bloodwing Knuckles
Bloodwing Knuckles.description: Knuckles that seemingly fit the Dark Angel. How can you return when your wings are covered in crimson blood..?

Frost Petal Hand.name: Frost Petal Hand
Frost Petal Hand.description: A guardian spirit that was passed down through generations of the North Polar Sea kingdom's bloodline. Petal-shaped ice flakes form along its surface to protect its user from harm.

Brasil Gauntlet.name: Brasil Gauntlet
Brasil Gauntlet.description: A combat glove used on the mystical island Brasil, which is located  west side of Ireland. This island can only be seen once every seven years. (Not to be confused with the country Brazil)

Bamboo.name: Bamboo
Bamboo.description: It doesn't thicken as it grows, and dies after blooming. We make baskets out of it because of its flexibility.

Tonfa.name: Tonfa
Tonfa.description: A weapon that is modified and widely used in Okinawa. Tonfa-based martial arts shares many similarities with bare-handed martial arts.

Plasma Tonfa.name: Plasma Tonfa
Plasma Tonfa.description: A tonfa-shaped weapon made out of plasma. It uses a chip that registers its owner's information, so it won't harm its owner and will be safe to use.

Grenade.name: Grenade
Grenade.description: Be careful! The moment you relax and forget you're carrying a grenade is the moment that you become a victim. Boom.

Molotov Cocktail.name: Molotov Cocktail
Molotov Cocktail.description: Make a mistake and drop it, you'll become your own worst enemy.

Flour Bomb.name: Flour Bomb
Flour Bomb.description: By combining a flour bomb and some gunpowder, you can make a smoke bomb. Let's see if there's any gunpowder around here...

Ball Lightning.name: Ball Lightning
Ball Lightning.description: You can knock out your enemies by throwing the hammer, but it's your choice to run or keep fighting.

Flubber.name: Flubber
Flubber.description: It feels like the innocence of childhood. If you drop it, it'll lose its viscosity and become stiff, so take care of it.

Spiky Bouncy Ball.name: Spiky Bouncy Ball
Spiky Bouncy Ball.description: A rubber ball with sharp fragments on the surface. It hurts. Also, don't underestimate its bouncing capability!

Smoke Bomb.name: Smoke Bomb
Smoke Bomb.description: Inflicts immense damage by emitting a poisonous gas. It is made from gunpowder and a special barrel.

Incendiary Bomb.name: Incendiary Bomb
Incendiary Bomb.description: Inflict damage by quickly spreading fire to an area. It'll be hard to extinguish.

David's Sling.name: David's Sling
David's Sling.description: David's legendary stone that killed Goliath, the giant of Philistine.

High Explosive Grenade.name: High Explosive Grenade
High Explosive Grenade.description: It hurts when you touch it, but it even hurts more when it explodes next to you.

Ruthenium Marble.name: Ruthenium Marble
Ruthenium Marble.description: Made out of Ruthenium, which is the hardest element among the platinum metals. It also has applications as a superconductor.

Razor.name: Razor
Razor.description: Check for these in your Halloween candy before you eat it!

Playing Cards.name: Playing Cards
Playing Cards.description: It's exhilarating to have a lucky win streak.

Dart.name: Dart
Dart.description: It's cute, but it can be deadly if it hits the right spot.

Vintage Cards.name: Vintage Cards
Vintage Cards.description: A shabby looking deck of cards. Probably used to gamble in a sketchy alley.

Throwing Stars.name: Throwing Stars
Throwing Stars.description: It's convenient, but be careful when using it. It doesn't come back to you like a boomerang.

Onyx Dagger.name: Onyx Dagger
Onyx Dagger.description: Made out of a throwing dagger and a cross. It practically jumps from the tips of your fingers to fly into the heart of your enemy

Chakram.name: Chakram
Chakram.description: The chakram is basically a throwing weapon, but in some cases, it also can be used to slash enemies like a melee weapon. Its circular shape has sharp blades around it, making it even more deadly.

Apricot Flower Tag.name: Apricot Flower Tag
Apricot Flower Tag.description: A brazen claim by some say they used to be fighters, but nobody has ever actually seen them fight.

Venom Dart.name: Venom Dart
Venom Dart.description: This deadly poison can kill an elephant within 3 seconds. Use it carefully.

Dharma Chakram.name: Dharma Chakram
Dharma Chakram.description: A legendary weapon Buddha used to exorcise a demon. It causes damage with the sharp blades that rotate around its perimeter.

Cards of Tyranny.name: Cards of Tyranny
Cards of Tyranny.description: A brazen claim by some say they used to be fighters, but nobody has ever actually seen them fight.

Fuhma Shuriken.name: Fuhma Shuriken
Fuhma Shuriken.description: A ninja star originally used by Humma, a band of ninja that were active during the Sengoku period.

Azure Dagger.name: Azure Dagger
Azure Dagger.description: Blue weapons aren't always associated with ice or water...

Sudarsana.name: Sudarsana
Sudarsana.description: A weapon of Vishnu, one of the three main Hindu Gods. It was used to destroy air fortresses.

Bow.name: Bow
Bow.description: Try not to cry if the bowstring hits your face.

Wooden Bow.name: Wooden Bow
Wooden Bow.description: A wooden bow. As plain as it seems, you need choice timber to make a usable wooden bow. Plywood is a no go.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: A unique Korean bow incorporating a horn in its designs. Anyone can use the bow, as it will adapt to the user.

Composite Bow.name: Composite Bow
Composite Bow.description: A high quality composite bow that was used in the East. There is a record of a man shooting over 440 meters during the England Archery Competition of 1795.

Strong Bow.name: Strong Bow
Strong Bow.description: A bow with strong elasticity, the bow string is made of 240 strands of three-ply thread.

Stallion Bow.name: Stallion Bow
Stallion Bow.description: A traditional Korean bow that can kill a tiger with a single arrow.

Mighty Bow.name: Mighty Bow
Mighty Bow.description: A bow that can be made by combining a bow and gunpowder. While hiding in darkness, you must draw the bow quietly, but quickly.

Pellet Bow.name: Pellet Bow
Pellet Bow.description: Can fire bullets instead of arrows. It'd be a good idea to check to see if there are more bullets around.

Scorchbow.name: Scorchbow
Scorchbow.description: A fiery arrow will burn your enemy.

Golden-Ratio Bow.name: Golden-Ratio Bow
Golden-Ratio Bow.description: A composite bow and arrow designed according to the golden ratio. It boasts extraordinary precision.

Twinbow.name: Twinbow
Twinbow.description: A bow modified to fire arrows with more power by crossing the bowstrings.

Elemental Bow.name: Elemental Bow
Elemental Bow.description: A bow with the elemental powers of nature, such as fire or electricity. Similar to the four elements of Aristotle.

Failnaught.name: Failnaught
Failnaught.description: The arrows of Tristan, one of the Knights of the Round Table. Known as the arrows that never miss, so it will fail you not.

Short Crossbow.name: Short Crossbow
Short Crossbow.description: This is a mechanical bow, so take aim and shoot at will.

Long Crossbow.name: Long Crossbow
Long Crossbow.description: A long range weapon that can shoot further than a standard bow. During the Chosun Period, there are records of shots landing from as far as 600 steps away.

Crossbow.name: Crossbow
Crossbow.description: A mechanical bow that requires little human strength, but reloading takes a little longer than an ordinary bow.

Power Crossbow.name: Power Crossbow
Power Crossbow.description: A good weapon, but it's paramount that you keep good track of your arrows.

Laser Crossbow.name: Laser Crossbow
Laser Crossbow.description: A bow specialized for sniping. As always, aim is important.

Heavy Crossbow.name: Heavy Crossbow
Heavy Crossbow.description: Heavier than a standard crossbow, but also that much stronger. It was a popular weapon in Medieval Europe as it was easy to learn and use.

Steel Bow.name: Steel Bow
Steel Bow.description: A bow made out of steel. It might be heavy to some.

Ballista.name: Ballista
Ballista.description: A smaller bow originally designed for siege warfare. It boasts incredible power.

Sniper Crossbow.name: Sniper Crossbow
Sniper Crossbow.description: A new type of bow with remarkably high accuracy. It's equipped with a laser sight, similar to modern sniper rifles.

Magnum-Python.name: Magnum-Python
Magnum-Python.description: If you research revolvers that use Magnum cartridges, you'll find that some of them use scientific names for snakes. This one is the  Pythonidae, also known as Python.

Double Revolver SP.name: Double Revolver SP
Double Revolver SP.description: This isn't two revolvers -- it's one double revolver.

Magnum-Anaconda.name: Magnum-Anaconda
Magnum-Anaconda.description: Named after the Anaconda, which is larger than a Python, it uses a larger caliber Magnum cartridge.

Devil's Marksman.name: Devil's Marksman
Devil's Marksman.description: You can perfect your marksmanship by selling your soul to the devil. What could possibly go wrong?

Elegance.name: Elegance
Elegance.description: Though it looks like an old gun, it is actually a smaller version of the railgun pistol. Up to 6 bullets are loaded from a clip. At first glance, it looks like a decoration, but it is just as effective as the real, full-size version.

Electron Blaster.name: Electron Blaster
Electron Blaster.description: It's not as strong as the laser guns used on the other side of the cosmos, but it's still pretty powerful.

Kelte.name: Kelte
Kelte.description: The gun of Manas, a hero of Kyrgyzstan. The gun’s barrel was formed from Damascus steel and fires death in bullet form.

Machine Gun.name: Machine Gun
Machine Gun.description: A gun that continuously fires bullets when the trigger is held down.

Gatling Gun.name: Gatling Gun
Gatling Gun.description: The world's first machine gun, it fires through several barrels joined together. Can cause catastrophic damage to the enemy in a short period of time.

Long Rifle.name: Long Rifle
Long Rifle.description: An old type of gun that isn't frequently used these days. Requires lighting a fuse to shoot.

Harpoon Gun.name: Harpoon Gun
Harpoon Gun.description: A powerful gun that fires harpoons. Thar she blows!

Golden Rifle.name: Golden Rifle
Golden Rifle.description: A rifle accented with gold. High in both accuracy, destructive power, and flashiness.

Railgun.name: Railgun
Railgun.description: Uses electromagnets to rapidly accelerate and launch a metal projectile.

Polaris.name: Polaris
Polaris.description: When a person dies, their soul will heads to the afterlife world. However, dying from this weapon appears to banish their soul even further. Perhaps to the North Star?

Needle.name: Needle
Needle.description: An item with multiple uses; limited only by your imagination.

Rapier.name: Rapier
Rapier.description: A one-handed sword for personal combat with a long, thin blade ideal for stabbing. Used mostly in the 16th and 17th centuries.

Sword of Justice.name: Sword of Justice
Sword of Justice.description: Historical texts state that Hong Gil-dong, the Robin Hood of ancient Korea, used it.

Volticletto.name: Volticletto
Volticletto.description: The word "Volticletto" is a portmanteau of 'voltaic,' meaning related to electric current, and the Italian 'Stiletto knife'. Punctures from this weapon cause double the pain.

Meteor Claymore.name: Meteor Claymore
Meteor Claymore.description: The silver-grey colored metals found in Meteorsteel can be used to make a great sword with great strength. However, manufacturing it is no easy task.

Hairband.name: Hairband
Hairband.description: If you use a cheap one, the glue might stick to your hair or ears.

Hat.name: Hat
Hat.description: Nothing beats than a simple cap when it's sunny, raining, or snowing.

Bike Helmet.name: Bike Helmet
Bike Helmet.description: A shabby and cheap looking helmet for when you take your bike for a spin.

Mask.name: Mask
Mask.description: If you can escape from Lumia Island, try visiting the Carnival of Venice. It's one of the most popular festivals in the world, but you can visit only if you manage to get out of here alive.

Circlet.name: Circlet
Circlet.description: A simple accessory worn on the head. It looks rather plain.

Beret.name: Beret
Beret.description: The trademark hat of painters and soldiers. It gets sweaty inside easily and it doesn't block the sun, but at least it looks cool.

Chain Coif.name: Chain Coif
Chain Coif.description: A piece of defensive equipment that was commonly used in Medieval Europe. It's quite heavy, but has good defensive capabilities.

Safety Helmet.name: Safety Helmet
Safety Helmet.description: Please wear your personal protective equipment in all construction areas.

Ballistic Helmet.name: Ballistic Helmet
Ballistic Helmet.description: Battered and tattered Ballistic Helmet. Initials marked inside the helmet scratched out and written over. Seems it's been passed around plenty of times.

Fire Helmet.name: Fire Helmet
Fire Helmet.description: Head protection for firefighters. Strong resistance to flames and heat. Also equipped with a flashlight!

Tiara.name: Tiara
Tiara.description: A crown-like accessory for the head. Worn by both princesses and beauty pagent winners.

Crown.name: Crown
Crown.description: The one  to wear the crown must bear its weight.

Close Helm.name: Close Helm
Close Helm.description: A helmet made out of steel to protect the head of its wearer. It's heavy, but it makes you feel safe.

Mithril Helm.name: Mithril Helm
Mithril Helm.description: A helm made of mithril that's been reforged through generations. Delicate reliefs carved into the surface hint at the craftsmanship invested into it.

Crystal Tiara.name: Crystal Tiara
Crystal Tiara.description: A tiara made of crystals. The intricacies are impressive.

Tactical OPS Helmet.name: Tactical OPS Helmet
Tactical OPS Helmet.description: A tactical helmet used by special forces. Military grade communication technology is built-in.

Helm of Banneret.name: Helm of Banneret
Helm of Banneret.description: The war has begun and the righteous knight stands at the vanguard. May the blessings of victory be upon him.

Laurel Wreath.name: Laurel Wreath
Laurel Wreath.description: A crown made of branches of a laurel tree, which is a symbol of Apollo. Crowns symbolize wealth, but a laurel crown symbolizes honor.

Imperial Crown.name: Imperial Crown
Imperial Crown.description: A crown built for the first and only monarch of the Kingdom of Finland, Friedrich Karl. However, due to the adoption of the republican constitution before the coronation, the crown has never been used since.

Imperial Burgonet.name: Imperial Burgonet
Imperial Burgonet.description: An extravagant burgonet used by the imperial family. Unlike a basic helmet, it is lavishly decorated

Windbreaker.name: Windbreaker
Windbreaker.description: A jumper that keeps you warm by blocking out the wind. It works best when it blocks the wind completely, so make sure to wear it properly!

Monk's Robe.name: Monk's Robe
Monk's Robe.description: Clothing for monks. The arm of each side is divided into four parts, representing Manjushri, Samantabhadra, Guanyin, and Ksitigarbha

Fabric Armor.name: Fabric Armor
Fabric Armor.description: Armor made from fabric. It doesn't seem to protect you from much. Good luck.

Leather Armor.name: Leather Armor
Leather Armor.description: Armor made from leather. Stronger than armor made from just fabric!

Leather Jacket.name: Leather Jacket
Leather Jacket.description: A reliable jacket that doesn't tear easily. Useful in most weather conditions.

Turtle Dobok.name: Turtle Dobok
Turtle Dobok.description: A martial arts uniform worn by ninja turtles. They're obviously giant turtles, why do they need masks?

Military Suit.name: Military Suit
Military Suit.description: Like a school uniform, these military uniforms get some people excited! But when you actually see them out in the street...meh.

Patched Robe.name: Patched Robe
Patched Robe.description: Made by patching together various robes. Might be more reliable than a regular robe.

Dress.name: Dress
Dress.description: Historically, not only women wore dresses as casual attire. In fact, it's only been about 600 years since men started wearing pants.

Bikini.name: Bikini
Bikini.description: It's a bikini made of a thin fabric. You might wanna suck in your stomach when you're wearing it. It's so versatile, men can wear it, too.

Diving Suit.name: Diving Suit
Diving Suit.description: A diving suit with filler between the inner and outer skin. It excels at maintaining body temperature and enduring higher pressure.

Rider Jacket.name: Rider Jacket
Rider Jacket.description: Worn more often as a fashion statement than for actual riding.

Chain Armor.name: Chain Armor
Chain Armor.description: Armor used in both Asia and Europe in the past. Made out of interconnecting metal links.

Suit.name: Suit
Suit.description: A sharp outfit that can be worn for any special event! Or if your office has a dress code!

Qipao.name: Qipao
Qipao.description: A traditional Chinese dress. They vary in style from simple cotton dresses to silk ones with elaborate fine details.

Sheet Metal Armor.name: Sheet Metal Armor
Sheet Metal Armor.description: Armor comprised of several layers of metal plates. Sheet Metal Armor is effective at withstanding slashing and striking attacks, but is weaker against long-range weapons.

Hanbok.name: Hanbok
Hanbok.description: A traditional Korean dress. The diverse range of colors and elegant embroidery enhances the harmony of curves and straight lines.

Bulletproof Vest.name: Bulletproof Vest
Bulletproof Vest.description: A vest used to protect your torso from bullets. The rest of the body is still vulnerable, though

Sunset Armor.name: Sunset Armor
Sunset Armor.description: Made of leather, it features a ruby that shines like a bright, red sun

Covert Agent Uniform.name: Covert Agent Uniform
Covert Agent Uniform.description: The uniform worn by agents that performed special missions for the King. Secretly.

Optical Camouflage Suit.name: Optical Camouflage Suit
Optical Camouflage Suit.description: In the right environment, body parts covered by the suit become invisible.

Rocker's Jacket.name: Rocker's Jacket
Rocker's Jacket.description: There's something burning in my HEART. Today, I can do anything.

Mithril Armor.name: Mithril Armor
Mithril Armor.description: Normal chain armor cannot completely protect its wearer from external impact, but the Mithril material on this armor defies the normality of chain armor.

Crusader Armor.name: Crusader Armor
Crusader Armor.description: Some say that this armor provides special protection from the undead. It's a shame there's no zombies around here.

Amazoness Armor.name: Amazoness Armor
Amazoness Armor.description: Armor bestowed upon female warriors with outstanding archery ability and agility. Allows for flexibilty and protection.

Dragon Dobok.name: Dragon Dobok
Dragon Dobok.description: A martial arts uniform designed for mental and physical training. You only qualify to wear this if you fulfill a particular set of prerequisites.

Commander's Armor.name: Commander's Armor
Commander's Armor.description: It's the General's armor, so it gotta be the strongest armor in town.

Butler's Suit.name: Butler's Suit
Butler's Suit.description: A graceful and courteous attitude, a soft tone, and a swallow-tailed black coat are the essentials of a butler. We can get a taste of high society by looking at them.

Battle Suit.name: Battle Suit
Battle Suit.description: A futuristic combat suit. It's made with bulletproof material that makes it great armor. However, when worn in hot areas, you might die of dehydration before encountering a single foe.

EOD Suit.name: EOD Suit
EOD Suit.description: Originally developed as a bulletproof vest, often used at bomb disposal sites due to its protection.

Kabana.name: Kabana
Kabana.description: The armor of Karna, hero of the epic, Mahabharata. The armor becomes one with the body.

Queen of Hearts.name: Queen of Hearts
Queen of Hearts.description: A magical cloak that only a true queen can wear. The magic from the cloak protected the Queen, but its power hasn't been used for a while...

Bandage.name: Bandage
Bandage.description: A patch that's pretty stretchy. It's good for covering injuries.

Bracelet.name: Bracelet
Bracelet.description: A metal bracelet. It feels tight. Maybe you're just nervous.

Leather Shield.name: Leather Shield
Leather Shield.description: Strong, but flexible. Not the best for blocking sharp attacks, but it's better than nothing.

Squad Leader Armband.name: Squad Leader Armband
Squad Leader Armband.description: An armband normally worn by a squad commander. How did you get this?!

Bracer.name: Bracer
Bracer.description: Throw this on your wrist to protect you from the bow string.

Sheath.name: Sheath
Sheath.description: Used to keep your blade sharp. Often decorated with jewels.

Golden Bracelet.name: Golden Bracelet
Golden Bracelet.description: Most gold accessories are actually gold alloys. True gold is too soft. This golden bracelet would have been worth far more if it were 100% gold.

Bazuband.name: Bazuband
Bazuband.description: Older styled forearm protectors to protect your, well, forearms.

Crimson Bracelet.name: Crimson Bracelet
Crimson Bracelet.description: A bracelet lavish with white and red gemstones. However, the large size of the beads may be somewhat annoying the wearer.

Steel Shield.name: Steel Shield
Steel Shield.description: A durable shield made of metal and leather.

Sword Stopper.name: Sword Stopper
Sword Stopper.description: It is, quite literally, armor that protects from swords. The hooks on it catch and entangle blades

Draupnir.name: Draupnir
Draupnir.description: The magical golden bracelet of the Norse God, Odin. It has the power to provide unthinkable riches... and a full stomach

Mithril Shield.name: Mithril Shield
Mithril Shield.description: A shield made with Mithril. It's light, but the strength is beyond imagination.

Creed of the Knight.name: Creed of the Knight
Creed of the Knight.description: Shielding is not just a skill that must be mastered by a knight, but also symbolizes a knight's creed to protect the weak.

Sword of Shah Jahan.name: Sword of Shah Jahan
Sword of Shah Jahan.description: A sword used by the emperor of India's great Mughal Empire. Due to the jewels around the sword, historians doubt its use in battle.

Bracelet of Skadi.name: Bracelet of Skadi
Bracelet of Skadi.description: A bracelet worn by Skadi, a Norse Goddess associated with winter. Do you feel a chill?

Radar.name: Radar
Radar.description: If you can get it working properly, it might help you find the location of anyone in the world.

Slippers.name: Slippers
Slippers.description: A slipper soaked in sweat. The stench alone makes it a serious contender as a lethal weapon.

Running Shoes.name: Running Shoes
Running Shoes.description: Everyone likes running shoes. You can walk in them, too y'know.

Tights.name: Tights
Tights.description: It's thin and tight. You can wear them on your legs or over your head if you're going to rob a bank.

Knee Pads.name: Knee Pads
Knee Pads.description: Learning to ride a bike? Put these on.

Chain Leggings.name: Chain Leggings
Chain Leggings.description: Protective leg equipment. Very effective and easily made.

High Heels.name: High Heels
High Heels.description: Makes you a bit taller. Maybe the air is fresher up there.

Heelys.name: Heelys
Heelys.description: They look like regular shoes, but you can ride them like rollerblades because of the wheels mounted in the heels. That's just the way I roll.

Boots.name: Boots
Boots.description: Protects your feet and calves. Don't wear them too tight -- it might restrict your bloodflow.

Steel Knee Pads.name: Steel Knee Pads
Steel Knee Pads.description: A kick to the shin is a favorite among angry girlfriends. Keep your shins protected.

Feather Boots.name: Feather Boots
Feather Boots.description: They feel as light as a feather! Maybe because that's what they're made of!

Maverick Runner.name: Maverick Runner
Maverick Runner.description: Heelys designed using futuristic concepts by the world renowned fashion company, Soberef. The parts are even certified by the Federal Aviation Administration. They are driven by linear motors that can get propulsion even when stopped, and there are eight compressed gas injection devices on the front allowing for limited three-dimensional operation. Also, they're LOUD.

Killer Heels.name: Killer Heels
Killer Heels.description: Heels sharp enough to be used as weapons themselves.

Mithril Boots.name: Mithril Boots
Mithril Boots.description: Boots made out of mithril. Stronger than steel and fireproof, too!

EOD Boots.name: EOD Boots
EOD Boots.description: Boots worn by explosives disposal teams. They protect the wearer's legs from shrapnel if something goes wrong.

White Rhinos.name: White Rhinos
White Rhinos.description: What kind of rhino wears boots..?

Boots of Hermes.name: Boots of Hermes
Boots of Hermes.description: Shoes worn by Hermes, the Greek God of Travellers. Try them on, you'll feel like you're floating.

Feather.name: Feather
Feather.description: Great for heat preservation or just for decoration!

Flower.name: Flower
Flower.description: Roses are red, violets are blue, this flower makes good items, try crafting them too.

Ribbon.name: Ribbon
Ribbon.description: It'll be pretty if you put it in your hair.

Fan.name: Fan
Fan.description: Sure, it's a bit old, but the wind from this fan isn't.

Buddhist Scripture.name: Buddhist Scripture
Buddhist Scripture.description: Smells like incense. No idea what it says, though.

Holy Grail.name: Holy Grail
Holy Grail.description: A relic that has materializes through various trials and adventures in Medieval myths. Many knights endured the trials, yet none ended up with a happy ending.

Binoculars.name: Binoculars
Binoculars.description: These don't seem to zoom in much. Perhaps it's because they're homemade.

Saint's Relic.name: Saint's Relic
Saint's Relic.description: The last relic of one who fought to save those who have fallen, despite being betrayed, tortured, and crucified.

Glass Pieces.name: Glass Pieces
Glass Pieces.description: Be careful not to cut yourself on the sharp edges.

Doll.name: Doll
Doll.description: Aren't you a little old to be playing with dolls?

Sniping Scope.name: Sniping Scope
Sniping Scope.description: You might be able to improve your accuracy with this on a rifle or other firearm.

Buddha Sarira.name: Buddha Sarira
Buddha Sarira.description: A relic found in the ashes from the body of Buddha. It smells vaguely of incense.

Quiver.name: Quiver
Quiver.description: Rather pointless by itself. On the otherhand, if you stash some arrows in it...

Feather Duster.name: Feather Duster
Feather Duster.description: Dust sticks to this thing like iron to a magnet. Feather dusters...how do they work?

Gilded Quill Fan.name: Gilded Quill Fan
Gilded Quill Fan.description: If you fan your face with this, try not to scratch yourself.

Powder of Life.name: Powder of Life
Powder of Life.description: A powder that summons the spirits. Better combined with other items to make something mystical.

Uchiwa.name: Uchiwa
Uchiwa.description: A fan with your favorite celebrity's face printed on it. It might block the view of the person behind you, so keep it at home during the concert.

Magazine.name: Magazine
Magazine.description: You can't fire a gun with nothing in the magazine.

White Crane Fan.name: White Crane Fan
White Crane Fan.description: Though a person may make plans in life, it is the heavens that will bring them to fruition.

Moonlight Pendant.name: Moonlight Pendant
Moonlight Pendant.description: It is not just a simple pendant. Magical powers are unleashed when shining a particular light through it.

Schrodinger's Box.name: Schrodinger's Box
Schrodinger's Box.description: The cat inside the box is both alive and dead at the same time. Use it to show off your knowledge of quantum physics.

Glacial Ice.name: Glacial Ice
Glacial Ice.description: It seems different from normal ice. It practically burns me to the bone by just looking at it. Keep it out of your lemonade.

True Samadhi Fire.name: True Samadhi Fire
True Samadhi Fire.description: Flames captured in a delicate glass sphere. Ascetics used it to escape.

Honey.name: Honey
Honey.description: Sweet and sticky. A natural ingredient that is good for cooking or just eating raw!

Ice.name: Ice
Ice.description: Without teeth, use gums! Without water, use ice!

Whiskey.name: Whiskey
Whiskey.description: A classic liquor made by distilling grain. Used as the main ingredient in many cocktails, but popular just by itself.

Coffee.name: Coffee
Coffee.description: Don't talk to me until I've had my fourth morning coffee.

Carbonated Water.name: Carbonated Water
Carbonated Water.description: It would probably be tasty if you made juice with this.

Boiling Water.name: Boiling Water
Boiling Water.description: Put something in it before it cools down.

Baijiu.name: Baijiu
Baijiu.description: A traditional Chinese liquor. Typically made from Sorghum. Often regarded as the best selling spirit in the world, due to China's affection for it.

Soju.name: Soju
Soju.description: Although this hard liquor might smell like disinfectant, it's loved by Koreans and can be found at every single social gathering.

Ice Coffee.name: Ice Coffee
Ice Coffee.description: You take it with cream and sugar?

Coffee Liqueur.name: Coffee Liqueur
Coffee Liqueur.description: A very popular liqueur. It goes well with milk...or vodka.

Honey Water.name: Honey Water
Honey Water.description: It is good for recovering stamina or if you have a sore throat.

Ice Water.name: Ice Water
Ice Water.description: You can even chew on the leftover ice after you drink it.

Kaoliang Liquor.name: Kaoliang Liquor
Kaoliang Liquor.description: A very strong 100-120 proof alcohol. It has a clean, soft taste and delicate scent.

Hot Honey Water.name: Hot Honey Water
Hot Honey Water.description: Did you ever hear that lukewarm honey is a cure for hangovers?

Flower Liquor.name: Flower Liquor
Flower Liquor.description: Made with real flowers for a unique taste!

Americano.name: Americano
Americano.description: For those who don't drink coffee, this takes like bitter water.

Herbal Liquor.name: Herbal Liquor
Herbal Liquor.description: It's sometimes consumed for its medicinal properties as it is made from medicinal herbs.

Purified Water.name: Purified Water
Purified Water.description: Clean water fetched from the well early in the morning. It can be used for medicine or to drink while praying for victory.

Hot Chocolate.name: Hot Chocolate
Hot Chocolate.description: A sweet, warm drink with cocoa powder and milk. Try it with marshmallows!

Potato.name: Potato
Potato.description: Boil them, mash them, or stick them in a stew. They're also delicious eaten raw. Potatoes are magic.

Garlic.name: Garlic
Garlic.description: A delicious addition to many dishes. Also great for keeping away vampires.

Adhesive Bandage.name: Adhesive Bandage
Adhesive Bandage.description: Useful because it sticks to skin well and doesn't fall off easily. Just don't keep it on for too long.

Carp.name: Carp
Carp.description: A carp is actually good for throwing. I don't think the carp likes it though.

Bread.name: Bread
Bread.description: A staple food. You can also staple it to trees.

Ramen.name: Ramen
Ramen.description: Put it in a bag, smash it into pieces, add some spices, shake it up, and eat.

Oriental Herb.name: Oriental Herb
Oriental Herb.description: An herb used in traditional medicine.

Chocolate.name: Chocolate
Chocolate.description: When you're low on sugar, eating this makes you feel strong and happy.

Curry Powder.name: Curry Powder
Curry Powder.description: Would taste great if it were cooked with hot water.

Garlic Bread.name: Garlic Bread
Garlic Bread.description: One of the most delicious substances known to man.

Carp Bread.name: Carp Bread
Carp Bread.description: Carefully contemplate where to take your first bite.. the head or the tail?

Holy Water.name: Holy Water
Holy Water.description: Holy water. Good for body and spirit.

Choco Pie.name: Choco Pie
Choco Pie.description: Delicious frozen or in the microwave.  You can even just eat the marshmallow in between

Acupuncture Needle.name: Acupuncture Needle
Acupuncture Needle.description: It stings.. but only just a little.

French Fries.name: French Fries
French Fries.description: This is undoubtedly the ultimate form of potato. Don't deny it.

Baked Potato.name: Baked Potato
Baked Potato.description: Just add butter and salt for an fantastic side dish!

Baked Carp.name: Baked Carp
Baked Carp.description: Fish is actually one of the most common foods to choke on.

Hot Ramen.name: Hot Ramen
Hot Ramen.description: With chopped onions and egg it tastes heavenly. You probably can't stop yourself from slurping it up when you eat.

Mocha Bread.name: Mocha Bread
Mocha Bread.description: Bread with a slight coffee flavor. Both the cream and raisin varieties are popular in Korea.

Chocolate Chip Cookies.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
Chocolate Chip Cookies.description: A timeless classic, the chocolate chip cookie is the king of snacks.

Choco Pie Box.name: Choco Pie Box
Choco Pie Box.description: A box of choco pies are like a first-aid kit for your soul.

Curry.name: Curry
Curry.description: Curry is a dish made by mixing many different kinds of spices. One of the main ingredients is turmeric, which may help prevent Alzheimer's disease.

Oriental Concoction.name: Oriental Concoction
Oriental Concoction.description: A concoction prepared by brewing medicial herbs. Revitalizes the body.

Fried Chicken.name: Fried Chicken
Fried Chicken.description: If it can fly and has wings and a beak, it's definitely a chicken. It could actually be a crow, pigeon, or whatever, but once you fry it, it will still be Fried Chicken.

First Aid Kit.name: First Aid Kit
First Aid Kit.description: The best bet for treating injuries. If you're in a hurt, this looks more like a treasure chest.

Stir Fried Ramen.name: Stir Fried Ramen
Stir Fried Ramen.description: Are there.. too many different ways to eat ramen?

Garlic Ramen.name: Garlic Ramen
Garlic Ramen.description: You can't compete with expertly cooked ramen.

Nail.name: Nail
Nail.description: Try hammering some of these into a baseball bat and take out a monster.

Leather.name: Leather
Leather.description: Are there any beasts around? Leather is versitile and can be used in tons of different ways.

Turtle Shell.name: Turtle Shell
Turtle Shell.description: Reminds me of a sandbox I had as a kid.

Rubber.name: Rubber
Rubber.description: A material that is always elastic. Unlike your cheeks, which lose elasticity day by day.

Scrap Metal.name: Scrap Metal
Scrap Metal.description: Very old, beat up metal. Can you craft a weapon out of this?

Lighter.name: Lighter
Lighter.description: The ability to make fire is key.

Stallion Medal.name: Stallion Medal
Stallion Medal.description: A form of identification that verifies the recognition of the royal order. There have been many cases where royalty have used this for inspection purposes.

Battery.name: Battery
Battery.description: Would be good for a flashlight, remote control, or your beeping smoke detector.

Alcohol.name: Alcohol
Alcohol.description: Whenever you smell this, either a laboratory or a hospital might come to mind.

Oil.name: Oil
Oil.description: At room temperature, this fatty component exists in liquid form.

Cloth.name: Cloth
Cloth.description: Made by weaving fibers. Different thread types make different fabrics.

Gemstone.name: Gemstone
Gemstone.description: An unrefined gemstone. Could be worth something in the right hands.

Glue.name: Glue
Glue.description: Why doesn't it stick to itself in the bottle?

Iron Ore.name: Iron Ore
Iron Ore.description: Just the ore. Extract the iron to make it useful!

Gunpowder.name: Gunpowder
Gunpowder.description: Explosive powder. It goes in guns. Boom.

Stone.name: Stone
Stone.description: A stone that can be thrown or be used to make something.

Glass Bottle.name: Glass Bottle
Glass Bottle.description: A glass bottle that is good for throwing.

Steel.name: Steel
Steel.description: Just some strong steel. They could name a football team after this.

Oilcloth.name: Oilcloth
Oilcloth.description: Oiled cloth. May be needed for something involving fire.

Heated Oil.name: Heated Oil
Heated Oil.description: Heated oil. It was sometimes used as a thermal weapon in the past, but now mostly used for cooking.

Ruby.name: Ruby
Ruby.description: Rubies and sapphires actually have the same chemical composition and mineral structure! However, rubies have a small amount of chromium that makes them appear red.

Dead Battery.name: Dead Battery
Dead Battery.description: Is a dead battery still a battery? Just throw it at someone!

White Powder.name: White Powder
White Powder.description: Unidentifiable white powder. Probably from chalk...

Tree of Life.name: Tree of Life
Tree of Life.description: A tree that accumulated a lot of vital force over a long time. Also known as the World Tree, it symbolizes the origin of the universe and the root of life.

Meteorite.name: Meteorite
Meteorite.description: A stone containing traces of alien vital force. It has mystical effects.

Electronic Parts.name: Electronic Parts
Electronic Parts.description: You can likely craft something out of this.

Blueprint.name: Blueprint
Blueprint.description: An elaborate blueprint. What on earth do all the lines and numbers mean?

Iron Sheet.name: Iron Sheet
Iron Sheet.description: This will give you goosebumps if you scrape your fingernails across it.

Gold.name: Gold
Gold.description: Soft, valuable, and gorgeous. A must have for any piece of jewelery.

Motor.name: Motor
Motor.description: A motor itself is useless, but you can probably turn it into something great.

Mithril.name: Mithril
Mithril.description: This silver metal has the best reaction to vital force. It was strengthened due to its long exposure to VF. Light as a feather, but stronger than steel.

Glass Panel.name: Glass Panel
Glass Panel.description: A glass panel used for a display. If you break the one on your TV, you gotta replace it with a new panel. At that point, you might as well just get a new TV.

Ion Battery.name: Ion Battery
Ion Battery.description: A high capacity battery made of lithium ion that can be recharged many times.

VF Blood Sample.name: VF Blood Sample
VF Blood Sample.description: Only the strongest can get this blood sample.

Force Core.name: Force Core
Force Core.description: This seems to hold untapped power.

Cell Phone.name: Cell Phone
Cell Phone.description: I'm not getting any bars here...
